fr.n7.stl.block.ast.impl

Class BlockFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.n7.stl.block.ast.impl.BlockFactoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockFactory, ExpressionFactory, InstructionFactory, TypeFactory

    public class BlockFactoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BlockFactory
    Implementation of the factory for building Abstract Syntax Tree node for the Bloc language.

      • createConditional

        public Instruction createConditional(Expression _condition,
                                     Block _then,
                                     Block _else)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionFactory
        Create a conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Specified by:
        createConditional in interface InstructionFactory
        Parameters:
        _condition - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is used as condition in the evaluation of the conditional when the Conditional node is executed. This node is assigned to the Condition branch of the conditional node.
        _then - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is executed if the condition value is true. This node is assigned to the Then branch of the Conditional node.
        _else - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is executed if the condition value is false. This node is assigned to the Else branch of the Conditional node.
        Returns:
        A Conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree with both Then and Else branches.

      • createRepetition

        public Instruction createRepetition(Expression _condition,
                                    Block _body)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionFactory
        Create a repetition node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Specified by:
        createRepetition in interface InstructionFactory
        Parameters:
        _condition - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is used as condition in the evaluation of the repetition when the Repetition node is executed. This node is assigned to the Condition branch of the Repetition node.
        _body - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is evaluated if the condition value is true before repeating the repetition.
        Returns:
        A Repetition node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

        Specified by:
        createPrinter in interface InstructionFactory
        Parameters:
        _value - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is printed when the Printer node is executed. This node is assigned to the Value branch of the Printer node.
        Returns:
        A Printer node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

        Returns:

      • createBlock

        public Block createBlock()
        Description copied from interface: InstructionFactory
        Create a root Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Specified by:
        createBlock in interface InstructionFactory
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree. To be used to create the root of the instruction part in an Abstract Syntax Tree. Then the branches corresponding to the instruction in the block will be added using the add method from the Block interface.

      • createBlock

        public Block createBlock(java.lang.Iterable<Instruction> _content)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionFactory
        Create a root Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Specified by:
        createBlock in interface InstructionFactory
        Parameters:
        _content - Abstract Syntax Tree of the instructions contained in the block.
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree. To be used when the Abstract Syntax Tree of the branches are already available.

      • createBlock

        public Block createBlock(Block _context,
                         java.lang.Iterable<Instruction> _content)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionFactory
        Create an embedded Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Specified by:
        createBlock in interface InstructionFactory
        Parameters:
        _context - Abstract Syntax Tree of the containing block.
        _content - Abstract Syntax Tree of the instructions contained in the block.
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createConditional

        public Instruction createConditional(Expression _condition,
                                     Block _then)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionFactory
        Create a conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree with only the then part.
        Specified by:
        createConditional in interface InstructionFactory
        Parameters:
        _condition - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is used as condition in the evaluation of the conditional when the Conditional node is executed. This node is assigned to the Condition branch of the Conditional node.
        _then - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is evaluated if the condition value is true. This node is assigned to the Then branch of the conditional node.
        Returns:
        A Conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree with only a Then branch.
